div.h5: Welcome to Bakersfield R-IV School District School District
div.p: It is our mission to provide effective classroom instruction so all students achieve at high levels. Every Child, Every Day, Whatever It Takes...

p.span: High School students/parents: If you or your child haven't signed up for the school's Remind, please do so with the code of your child's class. (Text the code to the number 81010) Class of 2020: @h36a36 , Class of 2021: @ad9ba9 , Class of 2022: @k3d4khc , Class of 2023: @g29kh6e
Just a reminder to our students: whenever possible, and I know it may not always be possible right away, please check your school email. Miss ya guys!

Class of 2020
A letter concerning graduation was included in the packets sent home this week. Make sure and look that over and let me know if you have any questions.
Caps and Gowns/other jostens items are now at the school. You can go to www.thegraduationcenter.com and pay ... read more

Even though the quarantine caught us in the middle of reading The Hobbit, our students managed to make some amazing projects. Hailee and Haley made awesome versions of Bilbo's home, "Bag End", and the "Spiders and Flies" chapter. Great work!
